Another Probation Would 
                               Not Convince the Wicked 


     We are to make the best of our present opportunities. There will be no other probation given to us in which to prepare for heaven. This is our only and last opportunity to form characters which will fit us for the future home which the Lord has prepared for all who 
                                                                           237
are obedient to His commandments.--Letter 20, 1899.
